rejected_labels.Security-Protocol-Update: Too broad; may refer to ongoing maintenance rather than a discrete event.
rejected_labels.Credential-Leak: Merged into Data-Breach as a subtype.
rejected_labels.Regulatory-Enforcement-Action: Merged into broader legal or regulatory responses; not specific to cybersecurity incidents.
rejected_labels.Cybersecurity-Standard-Release: Not an incident or attack; more of a policy or guideline publication.
rejected_labels.Nation-State-Cyberattack: Too specific in actor type; merged into broader attack types like Ransomware-Attack or DDoS-Attack.
rejected_labels.Incident-Response-Initiated: Describes a response process, not the initiating event itself.
